name: Opal LED Ceiling Light Spotlight
specification:
Power : 10w. 
Power Supply: 220V/50Hz. 
Light : White Neutral Yellow. 
Color Temperature : 6500K 4000K 3000K. 
Dimensions: 110*70 mm. Hole: 90 mm
description:
CRI color rendering : >92. Luminescence efficiency : 90 Lm/W. 
Projection Angle: 30 degrees. 
Material: Cast aluminum. Standard : IP 44. 
Made in Viet Nam. Lifespan: 50,000 hours.

name: LED SPOTLIGHT SLIDER LEDTSL02
specification:
Power : 23w. 
LED type: COB LED. 
Color temperature: 4000K. 
Luminance: 1500Lm. 
Color rendering index: ≥70Ra. Projection angle: 25 degrees
description:
Using advanced COB LED semiconductor technology. 
Instant start, high brightness, soft, no flicker, no harm to eyes. 
High color rendering index (CRI), for true color, CRI≥70. 
Long life 1000 hours. 
Aluminum frame is durable and aesthetically pleasing. No UV rays, no mercury, environmentally friendly.
